landing.tagline:
Find work that fits you, with AI.
Smart, personal and surprising.
landing.description:
For everyone who thinks: "What do I really want with my work?"
Whether you're just starting, stuck, looking for something new, or just want to reorient yourself – Vinster provides overview, support and direction.

who_we_are.title: 1. Who are we?
who_we_are.content: Vinster is a service of De Loopbaanopleiding, based in the Netherlands. We are responsible for processing your personal data as described in this privacy statement.

data_collected.title: 2. What data do we collect?
data_collected.intro: We collect the following personal data:
items: First and last name
Email address
Answers to career assessment questions
Technical data such as IP address and browser information
Payment data (processed by our payment partner)

data_usage.title: 3. How do we use your data?
data_usage.intro: We use your personal data for:
items: Providing our career service and generating your personal report
Communication about your account and our services
Improving our website and services
Complying with legal obligations

legal_basis.title: 4. Legal basis for processing
legal_basis.intro: We process your personal data based on:
items: Performance of the agreement between you and us
Your consent
Legitimate interest for improving our services
Legal obligation

data_sharing.title: 5. Data sharing
data_sharing.intro: We do not share your personal data with third parties, except:
items: With our technical service providers (under strict processing agreements)
When legally required
With your explicit consent

retention.title: 6. Retention period
retention.content: We do not keep your personal data longer than necessary. Account data is retained as long as your account is active. After deleting your account, data is permanently deleted within 30 days.

user_rights.title: 7. Your rights
user_rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
items: Right of access
Right to rectification
Right to erasure
Right to restriction of processing
Right to data portability
Right to object
user_rights.contact: To exercise these rights, you can contact us at team@vinster.ai

security.title: 8. Security
security.content: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration or destruction.

cookies.title: 9. Cookies
cookies.content: We use functional cookies that are necessary for the functioning of our website. These cookies do not store personal information.

changes.title: 10. Changes
changes.content: We may change this privacy statement from time to time. The most recent version is always available on our website.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.content: For questions about this privacy statement or the processing of your personal data, you can contact us:

definitions.title: 1. Definitions
items: Vinster: the service offered by De Loopbaanopleiding
User: any natural person using Vinster
Service: the online career tool and associated services
Account: the user's personal profile

applicability.title: 2. Applicability
applicability.content: These terms and conditions apply to all agreements between De Loopbaanopleiding and users of Vinster. By using our service, you agree to these terms.

account.title: 3. Account and access
items: You are responsible for keeping your login credentials secure
You are responsible for all activities under your account
You may only create one account per person
It is not allowed to share your account with third parties
We reserve the right to suspend accounts in case of abuse

usage.title: 4. Use of the service
usage.intro: When using Vinster, you agree that you:
items: Provide truthful information
Use the service only for personal, non-commercial purposes
Do not harm our systems or those of third parties
Do not infringe intellectual property rights
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

payment.title: 5. Payment and prices
items: The cost for Vinster is €29 for one-time access
Payment is made in advance via our secure payment partner
Prices include VAT where applicable
After successful payment, you get immediate access to the full service
We reserve the right to adjust prices

cancellation.title: 6. Right of withdrawal
cancellation.content: Since Vinster is a digital service that is fully available immediately after purchase, your right of withdrawal expires once you have gained access to your personal report. This is in accordance with Article 6:230p paragraph 1 of the Dutch Civil Code.

intellectual_property.title: 7. Intellectual property
items: All rights to Vinster belong to De Loopbaanopleiding
It is not allowed to copy or distribute our content
Your personal report is your property as a user
You may share your report, but not exploit it commercially

availability.title: 8. Availability and maintenance
items: We strive for 99% availability of our service
Maintenance is performed outside office hours where possible
We are not liable for temporary unavailability
In case of prolonged outages, we actively inform users

liability.title: 9. Liability
liability.content: Our liability is limited to the amount you paid for the service. We are not liable for indirect damage, consequential damage or lost profits. Vinster is a tool to support career choices; the final decisions remain your own responsibility.

termination.title: 10. Termination
items: You can delete your account at any time
We can terminate accounts for violation of these terms
Upon termination, access to the service expires
Your data will be deleted within 30 days after termination

changes.title: 11. Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to change these terms. Changes will be announced at least 30 days in advance via email. Continued use after the effective date constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

law.title: 12. Applicable law and disputes
law.content: Dutch law applies to these terms. Disputes will be submitted to the competent court in the Netherlands. We strive to resolve disputes amicably.

contact.content: For questions about these terms and conditions, you can contact us:
